sn55.37:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn55.37:1.2: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.37:2.2: “Yato kho, mahanama, buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti—
sn55.37:3.2: “Yato kho, mahanama, upasako panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjappamadatthana pativirato hoti—
sn55.37:3.3: ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako silasampanno hoti”ti.
sn55.37:4.2: “Idha, mahanama, upasako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim—
sn55.37:4.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.37:4.4: Ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako saddhasampanno hoti”ti.
sn55.37:5.2: “Idha, mahanama, upasako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato—
sn55.37:5.3: ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako cagasampanno hoti”ti.
sn55.37:6.2: “Idha, mahanama, upasako pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya—
sn55.37:6.3: ettavata kho, mahanama, upasako pannasampanno hoti”ti.
